title: Game Crashing
body: I updated League to 6.2 patch. I try to play rank and instead I crashed. I try to reconnect, but the client just kept crashing. Is anyone else having this problem?

replies.body:
Hey Scarce Creative,

We've noticed players running third party programs that interact with the game (Like LolReplay, BaronReplays, Overwolf etc.) may be causing players to crash right after champ select. Are you currently running any of those programs?

Tried to unknowingly spectate a game earlier that had a Sona in it.  According to other people on this board, I am experiencing the same thing now.

I just lost a ranked game that I didn't get to play because the game never loaded despite multiple attempts to restart my client and reload the game. 

Have you guys considered maybe putting out a server status update so that other people don't lose LP while you guys fix this incredibly ridiculous bug?
Im having the same problem, however I am not using any of those or any third party programs.
